testcase.purpose: This test validates the WebIDL included in the Messaging specification
Check if the conversationID attribute of conversation is valid
Check if the type of Conversation is participants if the conversation is defined as the set of messages exchanged among the same set of parties
Check if the type of Conversation is subject if the conversation is defined as the set of messages with the same subject
Check if the participants of Conversation is an array containing the participants in the conversation
Check if the subject of Conversation is the subject of the conversation
Check if the messageTypes of Conversation is an array contining the different types of messages included in the conversation
Check if the messageCount of Conversation is the number of messages in the conversation
Check if the unreadCount of Conversation is the number of unread messages in the conversation
Check if the lastMessageID of Conversation is the identifier of the message in the conversation with the most recent timestamp
Check if the cursor of Conversation return the MessageCursor to access the message in this conversation
Check if the element of MessagingCursor is the currently accessed element
Check if the next method of MessagingCursor can access to the next element
Check if the previous method of MessagingCursor can access to the previous element
Check if the findConversations method of message can return a conversation object
Check if the markConversationRead method of message can change conversation status
Check if the markConversationRead method of message which has three params can change conversation status successful
Check if the deleteConversation method of message can delete the conversation by the conversationID
Check if the findMessages methos of message can return a MessagingCursor object
Check if the getMessage method of message can return a message object
Check if the markMessageRead of message can change message status
Check if the markMessageRead of message which has three params can change message status
Check if the deleteMessage of message can delete the message by messageID
Check if the type attribute is the type of the messaging service manager
Check if the serviceIDs attribute is the identifier of the different services for this type of messaging service
Check if the getFetchMode method requests to retrieve the fetch mode associated to a specific service
Check if the setFetchMode method request to the messaging system to set the MMS message fetch mode for the service
Check if the send method of mmsManager can send a MMS message successfully
Check if the fetch method requests to fetch an MMS message with identifier equal to the indicated in the messageID parameter
Check if the clear method of mmsManager delete all the messages associated to the messaging service
Check if set up the received event successful for mmsManager using the type received
Check if set up the sent event successful for mmsManager using the type sent
Check if set up the deliverysuccess event successful for mmsManager using the type deliverysuccess
Check if set up the deliveryfailure event successful for mmsManager using the type deliveryfailure
Check if set up the readsuccess event successful for mmsManager using the type readsuccess
Check if set up the readerror event successful for mmsManager using the type readerror
Check if set up the serviceadded event successful for mmsManager using the type serviceadded
Check if set up the serviceremoved event successful for mmsManager using the type serviceremoved
Check if onreceived event can be fired when a new message is received on this messaging service manager
Check if onsent event can be fired when a new message is sent using this messaging service manager
Check if ondeliverysuccess event can be fired when a new succesful delivery report is received on this messaging service manager
Check if ondeliveryfailure event can be fired when a new failure delivery report is received on this messaging service manager
Check if onreadsuccess event can be fired when a new succesful read report is received on this messaging service manager
Check if onreaderror event can be fired when a new failure read report is received on this messaging service manager
Check if onserviceadded event can be fired whenever a new messaging service is enabled on this messaging service manager
Check if onserviceremoved event can be fired when an existing messaging service is disabled on this messaging service manager
Check if the messageID of MmsMessage is the identifier of the message
Check if the type of MmsMessage is the type of message
Check if the serviceID of MmsMessage is the messaging service id used to send / receive this message
Check if the from of MmsMessage is the sender of the message
Check if the timestamp of MmsMessage is the time the message reached the Multimedia Message Center
Check if the expiry of MmsMessage is the number of seconds the message will be stored in the Multimedia Messaging Service Center and thus available for download
Check if the read of MmsMessage is type of boolean
Check if the read of MmsMessage is false if the message has not been marked as read
Check if the to of MmsMessage is an array containing the recipient(s) included in the To field of the MMS message
Check if the cc of MmsMessage is an array containing the recipient(s) included in the Cc field of the MMS message
Check if the bcc of MmsMessage is an array containing the recipient(s) included in the Bcc field of the MMS message
Check if the subject of MmsMessage is the subject of the MMS message
Check if the smil of MmsMessage is the SMIL
Check if the attachments of MmsMessage is the set of attachments of the MMS message
Check if the state of MmsMessage is in the states of MmsState
Check if the deliveryInfo of MmsMessage is an array with each of the items indicating the delivery status
Check if the type attribute is the type of the messaging service manager
Check if the serviceIDs attribute is the identifier of the different services for this type of messaging service
Check if set up the received event successful for SmsManager using the type received
Check if set up the sent event successful for SmsManager using the type sent
Check if set up the deliverysuccess event successful for SmsManager using the type deliverysuccess
Check if set up the deliveryfailure event successful for SmsManager using the type deliveryfailure
Check if set up the serviceadded event successful for SmsManager using the type serviceadded
Check if set up the serviceremoved event successful for SmsManager using the type serviceremoved
Check if onreceived event can be fired when a new message is received on this messaging service manager
Check if onsent event can be fired when a new message is sent using this messaging service manager
Check if ondeliverysuccess event can be fired when a new succesful delivery report is received on this messaging service manager
Check if ondeliveryfailure event can be fired when a new failure delivery report is received on this messaging service manager
Check if onserviceadded event can be fired whenever a new messaging service is enabled on this messaging service manager
Check if onserviceremoved event can be fired when an existing messaging service is disabled on this messaging service manager
Check if the segments of SmsSegmentInfo is the total number of SMS segments needed to send the input string
Check if the charsPerSegment of SmsSegmentInfo is the number of characters available per SMS segment as per the encoding to be used to send the SMS message
Check if the charsAvailableInLastSegment of SmsSegmentInfo is the maximum number of available characters in the last segment needed to send the input string
Check if the send method of SmsManager can send a message successfully
Check if the clear method of SmsManager delete all the messages associated to the messaging service
Check if the messageID of SmsMessage is the identifier of the message
Check if the type of SmsMessage is the type of message
Check if the serviceID of SmsMessage is the messaging service id used to send / receive this message
Check if the from of SmsMessage is the sender of the message
Check if the timestamp of SmsMessage is the time the message reached the Short Message Center
Check if the read of SmsMessage is exit!
Check if the read of SmsMessage is type of boolean
Check if the to of SmsMessage is the recipient of the message
Check if the body of SmsMessage is the text of the SMS message
Check if the state of SmsMessage is in the states of SmsState
Check if the deliveryStatus of SmsMessage is in the states of DeliveryStatus
Check if the deliveryTimestamp of SmsMessage for sent messages the delivery date as reported in the TP-Discharge-Time (TP DT) parameter included in the SMS-STATUS-REPORT Protocol Data Unit
Check if the deliveryTimestamp of SmsMessage is exit
Check if the deliveryTimestamp of SmsMessage is null if there is no positive knowledge about the delivery of the message
Check if the messageClass of SmsMessage is in the states of MessageClass
Check if the send method of SmsManager which has no param can not work normally
Check if the send method of SmsManager which has one param can not work normally
Check if the segmentInfo method of SmsManager which has no params can not work normally
Check if the send method of MmsManager which has no params can not work normally
Check if the fetch method of MmsManager which has no params can not work normally
Check if the findConversations method which has only one params can not work normally
CCheck if the markConversationRead method which has only one params can not work normally
Check if the deleteConversation method which has no params can not work normally
Check if the findMessages method which has only one params can not work normally
Check if the markMessageRead method which has only one params can not work normally.
Check if the getMessage method which has no params can not work normally
Check if the deleteMessage method which has no params can not work normally
Check if the send method of SmsManager which has wrong type params can not work normally
Check if the send method of MmsManager which has wrong type params can not work normally
Check if the readonly attribute sms of MessagingManager exists and type of object
Check if the readonly attribute mms of MessagingManager exists and type of object
Check if the findMessages function of MessagingManager exists and type of function
Check if the findConversations function of MessagingManager exists and type of function
Check if the getMessage function of MessagingManager exists and type of function
Check if the deleteMessage function of MessagingManager exists and type of function
Check if the deleteConversation function of MessagingManager exists and type of function
Check if the markMessageRead function of MessagingManager exists and type of function
Check if the markConversationRead function of MessagingManager exists and type of function
Check if the readonly attribute type of SmsManager exists and type of string
Check if the readonly attribute serviceIDs of SmsManager exists and type of array
Check if the onreceived event of SmsManager exists
Check if the onsent event of SmsManager exists
Check if the ondeliverysuccess event of SmsManager exists
Check if the ondeliveryerror event of SmsManager exists
Check if the onserviceadded event of SmsManager exists
Check if the onserviceremoved event of SmsManager exists
Check if the segmentInfo function of SmsManager exists and type of function
Check if the send function of SmsManager exists and type of function
Check if the clear function of SmsManager exists and type of function

Check if the readonly attribute timestamp of SmsMessage exists and type of Date

Check if the readonly attribute to of SmsMessage exists and type of string

Check if the readonly attribute state of SmsMessage exists and type of String
Check if the readonly attribute deliveryStatus of SmsMessage exists and type of String
Check if the readonly attribute deliveryTimestamp of SmsMessage exists and type of String
Check if the readonly attribute messageClass of SmsMessage exists and type of String
Check if the readonly attribute messageID of MmsMessage exists and type of String
